menu.name: RTX Editor (Addon)
menu.desc: Small tweaks and quality-of-life options (more coming soon!)

checkbox.name: Disable startup note
checkbox.desc: Prevents the intro note from opening when the editor starts.

checkbox.name: Disable exit warning
checkbox.desc: Removes the confirmation alert shown when exiting the editor.

checkbox.name: Disable reload on save
checkbox.desc: Stops the editor from reloading when saving a new shader. (Note: You’ll still need to reload the editor to see the shader in the dropdown.)

number.name: Reload delay
number.desc: Time in seconds before the editor reloads after saving a new shader.

slider.name: Movement slide
slider.desc: Controls how much the character slides after moving.

checkbox.name: Thank you (may lag)
checkbox.desc: Enables a thank-you message that could cause minor performance drops.

checkbox.name: Autosave
checkbox.desc: Automatically creates backup copies in the background to prevent data loss.

number.name: Autosave interval
number.desc: Time in minutes between each automatic backup save.
